title: In-game sounds playing really low
body:
Hello, 

So I have had this bug for some time now, and basically all in-game sounds are very minute. 
What I have done : 

*  Made sure the Master volume is at 100% (in options - > Sound)
*  Made sure the sound is enabled (in options- > Sound) 
*  I checked the Faq  about sound issues (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761994-Sound-Issues)
I obviously checked what was in said Faq 

If anyone has an idea as to how to fix this, I would be really grateful  :)

replies.body:
Did you check your volume mixer? Sometimes you can accidentally turn it down from there and then forget later on. I know this has happened to me at least once. [**This guide**](https://www.howtogeek.com/244963/how-to-adjust-the-volume-for-individual-apps-in-windows/) will help you check that configuration.

Let me know if this was the fix!

Hello, 

It fixed it, I had only checked for the general sound setting and not for individual program's settings. 
I am clueless at to how it got set to such a low amount as I didn't manually lower the sound, so I guess I must have hit some obscure Windows shortcut while playing.

Thanks a lot !
Have you been using Discord before the drop of sound? Because I think the bug might come from there originally. At least the problem showed up for just after I started using it.

A bit of a late response from me, but yes I am using Discord. It is very possible for a program reducing external noises to create that kind of problem. I too have been thinking about Discord generating this problem. I suspect that Discord reduces other noises (the same way Skype or any other program would) but sometimes doesn't quite set it back to its original value prior to the call.

So in short, Discord might be the source of the problem. And going back to Window's volume panel every time it happens is the fix.
Thank you! I had the same problem and your solution worked!
